Job type: Permanent

🚀 Role: Java Fullstack Engineer

💾 Stack: Java, Springboot, Kubernetes, React, AWS etc.

This fintech management consultancy works with clients ranging from small investment funds to large established banks, helping them to streamline existing processes through their SaaS offerings.

They are looking for a Java Fullstack engineer to join them to continue their work on some legacy projects, as well as contribute to future greenfield projects launching this year!

️⚡ Industry: Fintech/Consultancy

🏢 Location: London

🏠 Working Policy: Hybrid

👔 Interview process: 2 stages

💸 Salary: £55-70k, depending on experience

(No VISA sponsorship available unfortunately)

If this interests you then please drop me a message ✌🏾

Reach me at abentley@trg-uk.com!

First DevOps hire. want Docker Kubernetes and ideally Python but will settle for another JVM language 

Title: Data Architect

Location: London

Workplace: Hybrid – 2 times per month

Salary: £110k + 10% bonus

What You’ll Do:

  • Design: Collaborate with engineers and product owners to craft cutting-edge data solutions, building the infrastructure for groundbreaking products and seamless data flow across the organisation.
  • Lead technically, sharing your expertise and guiding product teams toward data mastery. Upskill teams on new tools and techniques, unlocking the power of data.
  • Innovate: Stay ahead of the curve by researching, testing, and recommending the best tools and frameworks. Champion strong data governance practices, ensuring data security and compliance.

Who You Are:

  • Possess a deep understanding of data architecture principles, designing and implementing efficient and scalable solutions.
  • Thrive in sharing your passion for data, empowering others to learn and grow. Be a contagious source of knowledge.
  • Stay at the forefront of data innovation, constantly researching and exploring new technologies and trends to bring back to your team.

Ready to build the future of data-driven success? Apply now.

💰 Up to £110k plus 10% bonus
🛠️ Data Architect
💻 Hybrid 2-3 times per month (London-based office)

This market-leading Insurtech company needs your help as a Data Architect in designing and building leading-edge data solutions!

You will use your experience in data governance, stakeholder management and structuring and curating data flows to help guide product teams. Your role would allow you to:

-Standardise data architecture, data models, data governance
– Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure optimal delivery of data solutions
-Stakeholder management and communication with teams across the business

If you have experience in raising standards of data governance as well as experience in a product-led environment, apply below!

A venture-backed FinTech start-up who are retransforming the landscape of investor voting by giving ordinary people a voice in the boardrooms of companies like Facebook and Google, on issues like climate change, gender equality and human rights.

Founded by ex-Cambridge grads, they are a company that are incredibly passionate about their mission and culture, and value inclusivity, work-life balance and personal development.

You will:

⚙️ Design, implement and maintain pipelines using Python and AWS

🛠 Build and maintain data infrastructure

👥 Mentor other engineers

🤝 Company share scheme

☀️ 33 days holidays inc. bank holidays

🧘‍♀️ £50 towards personal wellness monthly

＋more!

No CV? No problem. Email me at athomas@trg-uk.com, and let’s arrange a call!

Looking for your next step in a growing FinTech start-up? Excited by the prospect of getting stuck-in and taking ownership over your own processes? Love building out fresh data platforms to be used by tens of thousands?

We’ve partnered with a start-up in the FinTech space, who are building a tool to facilitate a more equitable process during shareholder meetings! As a member of the data function, you would be using your skills in Python and AWS to work on numerous projects within data engineering in a collaborative team filled with go-getters like yourself!

Important details:

  • Salary up to £80,000 (+ benefits and a share scheme)
  • 3 stage interview process
  • Mostly remote role with monthly visits to London and Bristol (fully expensed)

Interested, or know someone who would be? Click apply or get in touch directly on mgojzewski@trg-uk.com

Senior Data Engineer

Scala, Python, Java, Apache Kafka, Spark, AWS

Up to £90k

London (min. 2 times per month)

Use your skills to change the world through data.

We are looking for a Senior Data Engineers to join a global project with far-reaching impacts. Now more than ever we need Data-Driven decision making to help reduce our impact on the planet.

You will be building scalable pipelines that ensure high quality data arrives in the right places.

The Successful Data Engineer will need:

  • Experience designing, planning and productionising scalable data infrastructure
  • Proficiency with at least one of Python, Scala or Java, as well as advanced SQL knowledge
  • Experience building batch and realtime streaming data pipelines
  • Capable of designing and implementing modern data solutions using AWS

If you are interested and would like to find out more information, please click the ‘apply’ button or contact me directly and I will get in touch. bedwards@trg-uk.com

Job Title: Engineering Manager (Java)
Annual Salary: Up to 115K (plus bonus)
Job Location: Central London
Job Type: Permanent – Hybrid working

This market leading insurtech company is looking for a Technical lead, with hands-on experience in Java, to lead a team of software engineers to drive the company’s product-led growth!

As an experienced technical lead, with access to central London, you will use your Java, AWS and CI/CD skills to help drive the scalability of their most successful product. This role gives you the opportunity to own your delivery work stream, communicate changes and decisions with stakeholders, as well as build team culture.

If you have experience in managing, Java and driving product-led growth, then get in touch.

Either click apply or reach me on 02073828120 / aday@trg-uk.com

Tech Stack: .NET, Azure DevOps
Working model: Hybrid
Contract type: Permanent, full-time

Join one of the world’s largest energy companies who are looking to transform from one of the largest polluters to carbon neutral by 2050!

As an experienced .NET Engineer, you will be involved in developing a security product for the business (no prior security experience needed!)

If you have 4+ years of experience in engineering, with strong .NET/ Azure DevOps skills, and feel confident in data structures, algorithms, and Leetcode-style challenges, then get in touch.

Either click apply or reach me on 02073828120 / aday@trg-uk.com

You will be provided with a generous benefits package and a hybrid working model.
